name: pure
description: disallows modification or access of state

name: payable
description: allows a function to receive ether together with a call

name: constant
description: disallows assignment (except for initialization), does not occupy storage slot

name: immutable
description: allows exactly one assignment at construction time and is constant afterwards. is stored in code

name: anonymous
description: does not store event signature as topic

name: virtual
description: allows the function's or modifier's behavior to be changed in the derived contracts

name: override
description: states that this function, modifier, or public state variable changes the behavior of a function or modifier in the base contract
